name: Small Bowl
description:
14cm Diameter | 7cm High The perfect small bowl for daily use and a great size for dips or snacks. We'll always be making this classic shaped bowl in the colours listed below to allow you to add pieces to your collection over time. We currently have three glaze colours available; Gloss White, Off White and Oatmeal. Gloss white is a very pure white with a high sheen and few speckles. Off white has a satin sheen with a lightly speckled finish. Oatmeal has a satin sheen with a speckled finish. All of our domesticware is hand thrown on a potter's wheel before being glazed and then fired in a kiln. We make all of our glazes in-house to allow for careful development of colour and finish. Each piece is fired to 1280 degrees C which makes them very tough and well suited to the rigors of daily use. We've kept the pricing of these bowls deliberately low to encourage their use on a day to day basis. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Oven safe from a cool oven. Further care instructions are noted in the Shipping & FAQ page.
All Anchor pieces are made to order. Please read the Shipping & FAQ page for product information, production times and shipping info. We're happy to assist with your order, so please email us from the contact page with any queries.

name: Shallow Bowl - Small
description:

name: Salad Bowl - Large
description:
23cm Diameter | 12cm High The perfect serving bowl for large salads or pastas. Beautiful as decoration on its own or filled with fruit. We currently have three glaze colour combinations available; Charcoal Exterior/Off White Interior, Gloss White Exterior/Interior and Off White Exterior/Interior. Charcoal is a beautiful glaze with a deep, slightly metallic lustre. The rich texture of the finish is achieved with the hand brushed application of three coats of glaze. Gloss white is a very pure white with a high sheen and few speckles. Off white has a satin sheen with a lightly speckled finish. Oatmeal has a satin sheen with a speckled finish. All of our domesticware is hand thrown on a potter's wheel before being glazed and then fired in a kiln. We make all of our glazes in-house to allow for careful development of colour and finish. Each piece is fired to 1280 degrees C which makes them very tough and well suited to the rigors of daily use. We've kept the pricing of these bowls deliberately low to encourage their use on a day to day basis. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Oven safe from a cool oven. Further care instructions are noted in the Shipping & FAQ page.
All Anchor pieces are made to order. Please read the Shipping & FAQ page for product information, production times and shipping info. We're happy to assist with your order, so please email us from the contact page with any queries.

name: Tiles
description:
20cm x 15cm x 0.5cm thick Price per square metre Our love of beautiful materials and connection to the design and architecture professions meant that we were always going to make tiles. We're currently developing a range of wall tiles that are suitable for use both in home environments or in commercial applications. Our traditional glazing techniques are used to produce a ceramic surface that is rich with the subtle variations of the hand. Initially we'll offer the tiles in the Charcoal and Off White finishes. Charcoal is a beautiful glaze with a deep, slightly metallic lustre. The rich texture of the finish is achieved with the hand brushed application of three coats of glaze. Off white has a satin sheen with a speckled finish. We're aiming to launch the tiles in a few months time so email us from the contact page if you'd like to be kept up to date about their progress.
All Anchor pieces are made to order. Please read the Shipping & FAQ page for product information, production times and shipping info. We're happy to assist with your order, so please email us from the contact page with any queries.

name: Tea Cup
description:
8.5 cm Diameter | 6cm High We're currently working on this cute little tea cup - perfect for the morning brew. The cups pictured are the first out of the kiln so we have a little more work to do before they are ready for release. Email us from the contact page if you'd like us to let you know when they're ready. We will be offering the tea cup in our Gloss White glaze initially. Gloss white is a very pure white with a high sheen and few speckles. All of our domesticware is hand thrown on a potter's wheel before being glazed and then fired in a kiln. We make all of our glazes in-house to allow for careful development of colour and finish. Each piece is fired to 1280 degrees C which makes them very tough and well suited to the rigors of daily use. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Oven safe from a cool oven. Further care instructions are noted in the Shipping & FAQ page.
All Anchor pieces are made to order. Please read the Shipping & FAQ page for product information, production times and shipping info. We're happy to assist with your order, so please email us from the contact page with any queries.

name: Potter Light - Small
description:
15cm Diameter | 14.5cm High Available from MAKE architecture This is our first light available to the public and we're excited to be doing so through MAKE architecture. MAKE have a well earned reputation for designing intelligent, sustainable buildings with a carefully considered material palette. Our shared ethos about design, materiality and making, makes us natural collaborators. All Potter lights are handmade giving each light its own unique character. Thrown on a potter's wheel, the lights are carefully hand glazed inside and out in a range of simple, beautiful glazes. They're made with a white stoneware clay and then fired to 1280 degrees C, making them very tough. The lights are designed as a shade and come supplied with the necessary electrical fittings and cord. The 3m cord is available in gold, black, and black & white fleck.
Please direct all enquiries about the Potter light directly to MAKE architecture by calling the MAKE office on
03 9853 4730 or via the MAKE website.

options.name: Charcoal Exterior/Off White Lip/Off White Interior
